wathman nithipathi janadhipathi nithignya palitha pranandu mahatha ada wishrama yamata niyamithayi. 2012 wasare juli masayedi ee mahatha nithipathi dhuraye wada baraganna ladi.1979 wasaredi nithignyayaku lesa nithi kshethrayata ekwu ee mahatha 1980 wasaredi nithipathi departhamenthuwe sewayata ekwiya.wasara 35k mululle wiwidha thanathuru daru prananduÂ  mahatha merata nithi kshethraye prawina deshakayaku lesa da prachalithawa siti.palitha pranandu mahathage wishrama ganimen purappaduwana nithipathi dhurayata pathkaranu labanne kawurundayi methek namkara nomatha.

ee anuwa, prathamika ha dwithiyika adhyapanaye gunathmakabhawaya ihala nanwima yatathe, wishayamala nawikaranaya ha wiwidhangikaranayatath, guru sanwardhanayatath, pasal paddhathiye gunathmakabhawaya thakserukaranayatath, pasal nangasituwime wadasatahana balaganwimatath, adhyapana nayakathwaya ha kalamanakaranaya diyath kirimatath, adhyapanaya thulin samaja sadharanathwaya ha antharkaranaya prawardhanaya kirimatath adala wa salasum kala wadasatahan ha kriyamarga idiri wasara paha thula kriyawata nanwimata katayuthu yoda thibenawa. 2020 thirasara sanwardhana aramunu sakshath karaganimata ha balagathu shri lankawak godanangima sandaha wana 2025 dakmata anukula wa ema aramunu langa karaganimata da mema wyapruthiya haraha dayakathwaya labenawa.

gatum awasana wimen pasuwa prathisanskaranaya, sanhindiyawa saha manawa himikam yana kshethrawala sarthaka prathipala athkara ganima sandaha shri lankawa dara athi prayathnaya pilibanda japanaya prasadaya pala karana bawa erata widesha katayuthu pilibanda amathi fumiyo kishida mahatha pawasiya.ee mahatha mese prakasha kale erata sancharayaka niratha janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha eeye (13) munagasunu awasthawediya.dewasarakata pera japanaye sidu wu bhumikampawen ha sunamiyen pasuwa shri lankawa labadun siyalu sahayogaya sambandhayen janadhipathithumata sthuthiya pala kala japana widesha amathiwaraya janadhipathi rajapaksha mahathage charikawa derata athara dirghakalina mithrathwaya ha sahayogithawa thawaduratath thahawuru kirimata iwahal wanu athayi wishwasaya pala kaleya.2004 warshaye di shri lankawata sunamiyen hani sidu wu awasthawe di labadun sahayogithawa sambandhayen janadhipathi rajapaksha mathithuma japanayata ha ehi janathawata kruthagnyathawa pala kaleya.
